activities:
247 Customer, Inc. receives personal information from Member countries of European Union owing to its Business as a  Software as a Solution provider through [24]7 predictive experience platform offered to Businesses (clients) across the Globe including European Union.  The information collected through our predictive experience platforms helps our clients to provide better experience to their customers and users (End Users) using their website.


[24]7 predictive experience platform offers solutions such as chat and other technological channels to allow the end users of our clients products or services to interact with our clients. Our solutions collect personal information either basis the consent provided to 247 Customer, Inc.'s clients or voluntarily.
eucountries: Germany, Ireland, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data collected through [24]7 predictive experience platform includes information collected through our services offered to our clients as a Software as a solution provider. The data collected can include Online, offline, chat data etc.
